title: Drawing, "Design for Textile Border with Floral Garland in Orange, Purple, and White"
description: Border design on maroon background: orange, purple, and white flowers in horizontal garland.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Textile Border with Floral Garland in Orange, Purple, and White".
Gouache on paper. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-388.
